gurmukhi: ਰਚ ਦੇਵ ਅਦੇਵ ਨਰੰ ॥ ਨਰਪਾਲ ਨ੍ਰਿਪਾਲ ਕਰਾਲ ਤ੍ਰਿਗੰ ॥੭॥੧੪੭॥
transliteration: Rach Dev Adev Abhev Naran|| Narpaal Nripaal Karaal Trigadg||7||147||
translation: He created the Indiscriminate gods, demons and men. He Created kings and the great crawling and dredful beings. 7.147.

gurmukhi: ਕੲੀ ਕੀਟ ਪਤੰਗ ਭੁਜੰਗ ਨਰੰ ॥ ਰਚਿ ਅੰਡਜ ਸੇਤਜ ੳੁੱਤਭੁਜੰ ॥
transliteration: Rach Dev Adev Abhev Naran|| Rach(i) Anndaj Setaj Outtbhujan||
translation: He Created many worms, moths, serpents and men. He Created many beings of the divisions of creation including Andaja, Suetaja and Uddhihibhijja.

gurmukhi: ਕੀੲ ਦੇਵ ਅਦੇਵ ਸਰਾਧ ਧਿਤੰ ॥ ਅਨਖੰਡ ਪ੍ਰਤਾਪ ਪ੍ਰਚੰਡ ਗਤੰ ॥੮॥੧੪੮॥
transliteration: Kooe Dev Adev Saraadh Pitan|| Ankhanndprataap Prachanndd Gadan||8||148||
translation: He Created the gods, demons, Shradha (funeral rites) and manes. His Glory is Unassailable and His Gait is Supremely Speedy.8.148.

gurmukhi: ਪ੍ਰਭੁ ਜਾਤਿ ਨ ਪਤਿ ਨ ਜੋਤਿ ਜੁਤੰ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਤਾਤ ਨ ਮਾਤ ਨ ਭ੍ਰਾਤ ਸੁਤੰ ॥
transliteration: Prabh(u) Jaat(i) Na Paat(i) Na Jot(i) Joutan|| Jih Taat Na Maat Na Bhraat Soutan||
translation: He is without caste and lineage, and as Light He is united with all. He is without father, mother, brother and son.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਹ ਰੋਗ ਨ ਸੋਗ ਨ ਭੋਗ ਭੁਅੰ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਜੰਪਹਿ ਕਿੰਨਰ ਜੱਛ ਜੁਅੰ ॥੯॥੧੪੯॥
transliteration: Jih Rog Na Sog Nab Hog Bhuan|| Jih Janpah(i) Kinnar Jachchh Juan||9||149||
translation: He is without ailment and sorrow, He is not absorbed in enjoyments. To him, the Yakshas and Kinnars unitedly meditate.9.149.

gurmukhi: ਨਰ ਨਾਰਿ ਨਿਪੁੰਸਕ ਜਾਹਿ ਕੀੲੇ ॥ ਗਣ ਕਿੰਨਰ ਜੱਛ ਭੁਜੰਗ ਦੀੲੇ ॥
transliteration: Nar Daar(i) Nipounsak Jaah(i) Kooe|| Gad Kinnar Jachchh Bhujan Dooe||
translation: He hath Created men, women and eunuchs. He hath Created Yakshas, Kinnars, Ganas and serpents.

gurmukhi: ਗਜਿ ਬਾਜਿ ਰਥਾਦਿਕ ਪਾਂਤਿ ਗਣੰ ॥ ਭਵ ਭੂਤ ਭਵਿੰਖ ਭਵਾਨ ਤੁਅੰ ॥੧੦॥੧੫੦॥
transliteration: Gad(i) Baaj(i) Rathaadik Paarit(i) Gadan|| Bhav Bhoot Bhavikkh Bhavaan Tuan||10||150||
translation: He hath Created elephants, horses, chariots etc., including footmen. O Lord! Thou hast also Created the Past, Present and Future. 10.150.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਹ ਅੰਡਜ ਸੇਤਜ ਜੇਰ ਰਜੰ ॥ ਰਚਿ ਭੂਮ ਅਕਾਸ ਪਤਾਲ ਜਲੰ ॥
transliteration: Jih Anndaj Setaj Jer Rajan|| Rach(i) Bhoom Akaas Pataal Jalan||
translation: He hath Created all the Beings of the divisions of Creation including Andaja, Svetaja and Jeruja. He hath Created the Earth, Sky, nether-world and water.

gurmukhi: ਰਚਿ ਪਾਵਕ ਪੳੁਣ ਪ੍ਰਚੰਡ ਬਲੀ ॥ ਬਨ ਜਾਸੁ ਕੀਓ ਫਲ ਫੂਲ ਕਲੀ ॥੧੧॥੧੫੧॥
transliteration: Rach(i) Paavak Paoun Prachanndd Badoo|| Ban Jaas(u) Ko( i)  Phal Phool Kaloo||11||151||
translation: He hath Created the powerful elements like fire and air. He hath Created the forest, fruit, flower and bud. 11.151.

gurmukhi: ਭੂਅ ਮੇਰ ਅਕਾਸ ਨਿਵਾਸ ਛਿਤੰ ॥ ਰਚਿ ਰੋਜ ੲਿਕਾਦਸ ਚੰਦ੍ਰ ਬ੍ਰਿਤੰ ॥
transliteration: Bhooa Mer Akaas Nivaas Chhitan|| Rach(i) Rog Ikaadas Channdra Britan||
translation: He hath Created the Earth, Sumeru mountain and the sky, the Earth hath been made the abode for living. The Muslim fasts and the Ekadashi fast hath been associated with the moon.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਤਿ ਚੰਦ ਦਿਨੀ ਸਹਿ ਦੀਪ ਦੲੀ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਪਾਬਕ ਪੌਨ ਪ੍ਰਚੰਡ ਮੲੀ ॥੧੨॥੧੫੨॥
transliteration: Dout(i) Channd Dinoo Sah(i) Doop Daee|| Jih Paavak Paoun Prachanndd Maee||12||152||
translation: The lamps of moon and sun have been Created. And the Powerful elements of fire and air have been Created. 12.152.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਹ ਖੰਡ ਅਖੰਡ ਪ੍ਰਚੰਡ ਕੀੲੇ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਛਤ੍ਰ ੳੁਪਾੲਿ ਛਿਪਾੲਿ ਦੀੲੇ ॥
transliteration: Jih Khannd Akhanndd Prachanndd Keea|| Jih Chhatra Oupaae Chhipaae Deea||
translation: He hath Created the indivisible sky with Sun within it. He hath Created the stars and concealed them within Sun’s Light.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਹ ਲੋਕ ਚਤੁਰ ਦਸ ਚਾਰ ਰਚੇ ॥ ਗਣ ਗੰਧ੍ਰਬ ਦੇਵ ਅਦੇਵ ਸਚੇ ॥੧੩॥੧੫੩॥
transliteration: Jih Lok Chatur Das Chaar Rache|| Gad Gaddhrab Dev Adev Sache||13||153||
translation: He hath Created the fourteen beautiful worlds. And hath also Created Ganas, Gandharvas, gods and demons.13.153.

gurmukhi: ਅਨਧੂਤ ਅਭੂਤ ਅਛੂਤ ਮਤੰ ॥ ਅਨਗਾਧ ਅਬਯਾਧ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਗਤੰ ॥
transliteration: Andhoot Abhoot Achhodht Matan|| Anaddh Abyaadh Anaadh Gadan||
translation: He is Immaculate, Elementless with unpolluted intellect. He is Unfathomable, without malady and is active from Eternity.
